title: Unable to see any summoner icons or champion portraits both in my collection and in champ select
body:
[View of my collection](https://prnt.sc/hw764x)
[View of champion select](https://prnt.sc/hw76f0)

I am completely unable to see any icons, and as shown in the view of champ select, I am unable to even filter my champions so that I know what I am picking. Please help. Thank you.

replies.body:
Thanks for the screenshots, this definitely looks like a hassle.  This is likely happening from a connection issue that's not loading up your assets properly.  Are you on wifi? 

It could also be game files having trouble rendering.  Try a repair and let me know if that helps, but test it in a custom game!
So I did a full repair, it failed halfway through, so i restarted the client and it had a .2 mb patch and now its fixed. Somehow? Thank you very much for the help!

I'm glad to hear everything is okay now, but be wary as it could just be a coincidence.  For example, if it failed halfway it may be your connection losing comms with the patching service.  You might still have an unstable connection so you could see it happen again.  Run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide if it does to help squash whatever is causing this.
